item.title: OpenAI Teams Up With Oracle and SoftBank to Build 5 New Stargate Data Centers
item.description: The new sites will boost Stargate’s planned capacity to nearly 7 gigawatts—about equal to the output of seven large nuclear reactors.

item.title: Trump’s Tylenol Directive Could Actually Increase Autism Rates, Researchers Warn
item.description: Experts fear that Donald Trump’s anti-painkiller tirade could lead to an increase in risk factors for autism, and don’t trust the administration to as...

item.title: Scott Wiener on his fight to make Big Tech disclose AI’s dangers
item.description: The California lawmaker is on his second attempt to pass a first-in-the-nation AI safety bill. This time, it might work.

item.title: The 39 Best Shows on Apple TV+ Right Now (October 2025)
item.description: The Morning Show, Slow Horses, and Platonic are among the best shows on Apple TV+ this month.

item.title: How Google’s dev tools manager makes AI coding work
item.description: Google PM Ryan Salva is responsible for tools like Gemini CLI, giving him a front-row seat to the ways AI tools are changing software development.
